. Annot is nestled 750m up in the valley of the Vaïre between the Mercantour National Park and the Gorges du Verdon.

line, but the stop is at Les Scaffarels, 2km from Annot proper. Contact Autocars SCAL, Tel: +334 92 51 06 05.
The old village is a truly fascinating area to explore. The district also encompasses the hamlets of Rouaine, Les Scaffarels and Les Gastres.
